scripts.sync-today: node -e "const {CONFIG} = require('./hikvision-event-sync.js'); CONFIG.dateRange.startDate = CONFIG.dateRange.endDate = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; require('./hikvision-event-sync.js').main()"
scripts.sync-week: node -e "const {CONFIG} = require('./hikvision-event-sync.js'); const end = new Date(); const start = new Date(end.getTime() - 7*24*60*60*1000); CONFIG.dateRange.startDate = start.toISOString().split('T')[0]; CONFIG.dateRange.endDate = end.toISOString().split('T')[0]; require('./hikvision-event-sync.js').main()"
scripts.sync-month: node -e "const {CONFIG} = require('./hikvision-event-sync.js'); const end = new Date(); const start = new Date(end.getTime() - 30*24*60*60*1000); CONFIG.dateRange.startDate = start.toISOString().split('T')[0]; CONFIG.dateRange.endDate = end.toISOString().split('T')[0]; require('./hikvision-event-sync.js').main()"
